text: Come Fly with Me is a British mockumentary comedy television series. It was created by and stars Matt Lucas and David Walliams. The series is narrated by Lindsay Duncan. It was first broadcast on 25 December 2010 on BBC One. The series parodies many airlines including British Airways (as 'Great British Air') and Ryanair (as 'Our Lady Air'). In June 2020, Come Fly with Me, as well as Little Britain, was removed from Netflix for the use of blackface, brownface and yellowface. Six months before this, it was removed from BritBox. title: Come Fly with Me (2010 TV series)
